name: Tower Defense - Demo
description:
This game was made during the course "Unity Game Development Academy: Make 2D & 3D Games".

Move the towers on the map with the left mouse button and defeat the waves of zombies before reaching the end.

All the graphics and music resources are not my own, they were to help me develop this demo, the code is made by me. With this demo I do not seek to make money, just to let me know for future projects. Enjoy the demo.
